item.title: Shortest Path
item.description: Maze I bool hasPath(vector<vector<int>> & maze, vector<int> & start, vector<int> & dest) { const vector<int> dx = {0, -1, 1, 0}; const vector<int> dy = {1, 0, 0, -1}; queue<pair<int, int>> q; q.emplace(start[0], start[1]); maze[start[0]][start[1]] = 2; int m = maze.size(); int n = maze.front().size(); while (!q.empty()) { auto cur = q.front(); q.pop(); int x = cur.first; int y = cur.second; if (x == dest[0] && y == dest[1]) { return true; } for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) { int xx = x; int yy = y; while (xx >= 0 && xx < m && yy >= 0 && yy < n && maze[xx][yy] !

item.title: Topics on Gragh Algorithm
